item.title: Baltimore Museum of Art Does Another Ho-Hum Race Show
item.description: Black Earth Rising seasons oppression with the climate folly — the museum can do better.

item.title: Trump Is Going It Alone in Iran, and That’s Fine by Congress
item.description: Regardless of whether he orders a strike, we can be confident there will be no new congressional vote on the use of military force.

item.title: Pete Hegseth Has Already Changed the Pentagon for the Better
item.description: The secretary of defense has been dedicated to restoring a military that stands above politics and is built for one purpose: to fight and win wars.

item.title: Providing a Granite Foundation: Why New Hampshire Is 2025’s School-Choice Model
item.description: School choice is reshaping how America thinks about public education.
